general.name: Nudist
general.description: {{name}} prefers not to wear clothing

general.name: Bloodlust
general.description: {{name}} likes to inflict pain onto others and is not bothered by death.

general.name: Kind
general.description: {{name}} will never use insults.

general.name: Psychopath
general.description: {{name}} has no empathy.

general.name: Cannibal
general.description: {{name}} prefers meat of their own race.

general.name: Abrasive
general.description: {{name}} will speak their mind without holding back.

general.name: Savant
general.description: {{name}} is very intelligent, but can't deal with stress.

general.name: Handy
general.description: {{name}} will pick up skills faster than others.

general.name: Nimble
general.description: {{name}} can dodge attacks much more easily.

general.name: Brawler
general.description: {{name}} want to fight with a melee weapon.

general.name: Masochist
general.description: {{name}} likes being hurt.

general.name: Race Dysphoria
general.description: {{name}} feels like they're in the wrong body.

general.name: Night Owl
general.description: {{name}} sleeps during the day and is active at night.

general.name: Greedy
general.description: {{name}} wants to acquire as much capital as possible.

general.name: Jealous
general.description: {{name}} feels degraded when others around are doing better.

general.name: Ascetic
general.description: {{name}} prefers to live a poor life style.

general.name: Gay
general.description: {{name}} is attracted to the same sex.

general.name: Misandrist
general.description: {{name}} distrusts men.

general.name: Misogynist
general.description: {{name}} distrusts women.

general.name: Tough
general.description: {{name}} is much more difficult to hurt than others.

general.name: Annoying Voice
general.description: {{name}} is annoying to listen too. Others are more likely to dislike {{name}}.

general.name: Wimp
general.description: {{name}} is weak and cowardly.

general.name: Xenophobic
general.description: {{names}} hates races that are different than his.

drug.name: Addict
drug.description: {{name}} will consume as many drugs as they can get their hands on, even going so far as to disregard their own health.

drug.name: Abuser
drug.description: {{name}} uses drugs more frequently than the average recreational user.

drug.name: Abstain
drug.description: {{name}} refuses to use any mind altering substances.

industry.name: Industrious
industry.description: {{name}} can stay focused and get things done much faster than the average person.

industry.name: Hard Working
industry.description: {{name}} works faster than the average person.

industry.name: Lazy
industry.description: {{name}} is a bit lazy and works slower than others.

industry.name: Sloth
industry.description: {{name}} loves being idle and enjoys not being productive.

speed.name: Quick
speed.description: {{name}} always wants to be the first one to arrive.

mood.name: Sanguine
mood.description: {{name}} is always upbeat no matter how terrible the situation.

nerves.name: Iron Will
nerves.description: {{name}} can hold true through thick and thin, even in the worst of situations.

nerves.name: Steadfast
nerves.description: {{name}} can handle stress that would crack most others.

nerves.name: Volatile
nerves.description: {{name}} cracks at the first sign of pressure.

neurotic.name: Neurotic
neurotic.description: {{name}} workers harder than others to keep affairs in order, but breaks more easily under pressure.

neurotic.name: Very Neurotic
neurotic.description: {{name}} is constantly nervous about everything that has to be done.

archery.name: Steady Aim
archery.description: {{name}} takes more time to aim, but hits the target more frequently

beauty.name: Beautiful
beauty.description: Everybody enjoys looking at {{name}} and will like them before even talking to them.

beauty.name: Unattractive
beauty.description: {{name}} slightly repels others in social situations.

beauty.name: Ugly
beauty.description: {{name}} is unpleasent to look and interact with.
